name: Party Soccer
description:
Multiplayer Soccer for 2 or 4 players with insane rules!

Select your own rules out of the many options and have fun with your friends.

Features:
- Easy slinging controls
- Tackling, knock 'em down!
- 2 and 4 player multiplayer madness
- Optional modes including Multiball, Power Kicks, Super Speed, Wonky Camera and Inverse Controls
- Sudden death overtime for tight matches!
- Day, Evening, Night and Morning atmospheres

P.S. Wonky Camera -mode is guaranteed to make you dizzy!

Break a leg (or two)!

For more information and nutty games, see Part Time Monkey Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/parttimemonkey
